languages.text: "Я дам сжатую версию — если рассказывать подробно, ситуация может взорваться. Итак... все началось с того, что блюстители обнаружили культистский амулет на теле жертвы пьяной драки. Мы немедленно доложили наверх, организовали очистительный молебен и начали расследование. Живых еретиков обнаружено не было. Но в ходе поисков между блюстителями и рабочими назрел конфликт".

"The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."
languages.original_text: "Я дам сжатую версию — если рассказывать подробно, ситуация может взорваться. Итак... все началось с того, что блюстители обнаружили культистский амулет на теле жертвы пьяной драки. Мы немедленно доложили наверх, организовали очистительный молебен и начали расследование. Живых еретиков обнаружено не было. Но в ходе поисков между блюстителями и рабочими назрел конфликт".

traits.locale_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the guards found a pirate Chaos amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No pirates have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between guards and workers to a head."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “考虑到目前的紧张气氛一触即发，我就简要地和您说说吧……事情的起因是这样的，那些执法者在某个醉酒斗殴中被杀的船员身上发现了邪教的护身符。我们立刻向上级报告了这件事情，举行了一场净化仪式，并进行了调查。虽然我们并没有发现任何活着的异端分子，但这次调查让执法者与工人之间紧张的关系到达了顶峰。”
languages.original_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到目前的紧张气氛一触即发，我就简要地和您说说吧……事情的起因是这样的，那些镇压者在某个醉酒斗殴中被杀的船员身上发现了邪教的护身符。我们立刻向上级报告了这件事情，举行了一场净化仪式，并进行了调查。虽然我们并没有发现任何活着的海盗，但这次调查让镇压者与工人之间紧张的关系到达了顶峰。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «La situación podría explotar en cualquier momento, así que le daré la versión resumida... Empezó cuando el personal de seguridad encontró un amuleto de sectario en el cadáver de alguien que había muerto en una reyerta motivada por el alcohol. Informamos a los cargos superiores, organizamos un ritual purificador e iniciamos una investigación. No encontramos herejes vivos. Pero el registro ha provocado que las tensiones entre seguridad y los trabajadores estallen».
languages.original_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."

traits.locale_text: «La situación podría explotar en cualquier momento, así que le daré la versión resumida... Empezó cuando el personal de seguridad encontró un amuleto de sectario en el cadáver de alguien que había muerto en una reyerta motivada por el alcohol. Informamos a los cargos superiores, organizamos un ritual purificador e iniciamos una investigación. No encontramos piratas vivos. Pero el registro ha provocado que las tensiones entre seguridad y los trabajadores estallen».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「事態はいつ爆発してもおかしくないので、要約して説明すしますと…事の発端は、酔っぱらいの乱闘で殺された人の遺体から教団のお守りをエンフォーサーが発見したことでした。すぐに上層部に報告し、浄化の儀式を手配し、調査を開始しました。生きている異端者は見つかってはいません。ですが、この捜索によって、エンフォーサーと労働者の間に緊張が走ったのです」
languages.original_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."

traits.locale_text: 「事態はいつ爆発してもおかしくないので、要約して説明すしますと…事の発端は、酔っぱらいの乱闘で殺された人の遺体から教団のお守りをエンフォーサーが発見したことでした。すぐに上層部に報告し、浄化の儀式を手配し、調査を開始しました。生きている異端者は見つかってはいません。ですが、この捜索によって、エンフォーサーと労働者の間に緊張が走ったのです」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Die Lage könnte jede Minute eskalieren, ich fasse mich also kurz ... Es begann damit, dass die Enforcers bei der Leiche eines Opfers einer betrunkenen Schlägerei ein Kultistenamulett fanden. Wir haben es unverzüglich bei unseren Vorgesetzten gemeldet, ein Läuterungsritual arrangiert und eine Untersuchung eingeleitet. Es wurden keine lebenden Ketzer gefunden. Die Suche hat jedoch die Spannungen zwischen Enforcers und Arbeitern eskalieren lassen."
languages.original_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lage könnte jede Minute eskalieren, ich fasse mich also kurz ... Es begann damit, dass die Enforcers bei der Leiche eines Opfers einer betrunkenen Schlägerei ein Kultistenamulett fanden. Wir haben es unverzüglich bei unseren Vorgesetzten gemeldet, ein Läuterungsritual arrangiert und eine Untersuchung eingeleitet. Es wurden keine lebenden Piraten gefunden. Die Suche hat jedoch die Spannungen zwischen Enforcers und Arbeitern eskalieren lassen."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « La situation pourrait dégénérer d'un instant à l'autre, j'irai donc droit au but... Tout a commencé quand le service d'ordre a découvert une amulette de cultiste sur le corps d'un homme tué lors d'une bagarre d'ivrognes. Nous en avons aussitôt informé la hiérarchie, après quoi nous avons organisé un rituel de purification et ouvert une enquête. Si aucun hérétique vivant n'a été retrouvé à bord, les fouilles ont attisé les tensions entre les ouvriers et les prévôts. »
languages.original_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."

traits.locale_text: « La situation pourrait dégénérer d'un instant à l'autre, j'irai donc droit au but... Tout a commencé quand le service d'ordre a découvert une amulette de cultiste sur le corps d'un homme tué lors d'une bagarre d'ivrognes. Nous en avons aussitôt informé la hiérarchie, après quoi nous avons organisé un rituel de purification et ouvert une enquête. Si aucun pirate vivant n'a été retrouvé à bord, les fouilles ont attisé les tensions entre les ouvriers et les prévôts. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Durum her an kontrolden çıkabileceği için özet geçmek daha makul olur... Olay, ayyaşların çıkardığı bir kavgada öldürülen birinin üzerinde infazcıların bir tarikatçı uğurluğu bulmasıyla başladı. Komuta zinciri dâhilinde durumu bildirdik, arınma ayini düzenledik ve soruşturma açtık. Sonuç olarak hiçbir kâfir tespit edemedik. Soruşturmalarımız ise işçilerle infazcılar arasındaki gerginliği kırılma noktasına taşıdı."
languages.original_text: "The situation could boil over at any minute, so I'll give you the condensed version... It all began when the enforcers found a cultist amulet on the body of someone who'd been killed in a drunken brawl. We reported it up the chain immediately, arranged for a cleansing rite to be performed, and opened an investigation. No heretics have been found alive. But the search has brought tensions between enforcers and workers to a head."

traits.locale_text: "Durum her an kontrolden çıkabileceği için bir özet geçmek daha makul olur... Olay, ayyaşların çıkardığı bir kavgada öldürülen birinin üzerinde infazcıların bir tarikatçı uğurluğu bulmasıyla başladı. Komuta zinciri dahilinde durumu bildirdik, arınma ayini düzenledik ve soruşturma açtık. Sonuç olarak bir kâfir tespit edemedik ama soruşturmalarımız, işçilerle infazcıların arasındaki gerginliği kırılma noktasına taşıdı."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
